mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs ( title, contents, created_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT bbs_id, title, contents, view_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_at, member_code FROM bbs WHERE bbs_id=#{bbsId} AND is_deleted='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, modify_at = NOW() WHERE bbs_id=#{bbsId}
UPDATE bbs SET is_deleted = '1', modify_at = NOW() WHERE bbs_id=#{bbsId}
